title: Karma
description: Ever since rogues kidnapped her and her little sister leaving everyone else dead, Serenity Clay has dreamed of revenge. Intelligent and highly trained as an assassin, Serenity has her chance, but to go against the rogues would mean signing her sister’s death warrant. That is until she is arrested by the Bureau of Supernatural Defence. In an attempt to avoid the death penalty she agrees to a deal - to work for the Bureau and help them eliminate the rogue race entirely. Now the clock is ticking on her sister’s life.*This is a 17,000 word novella. An introduction into Serenity Clay's life.
author: Sammie Wilson
